name: Star Seraph Scepter
text:
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Star Seraph" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Star Seraph Scepter". An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using 3 or more monsters, including this card on the field, as materials gains this effect.
? When it is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 other card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, you can draw 1 card.
